name: Exit Whole
description:
Exit the cave. Find something else along the way.

Entry for the 2022 Epic MegaJam

Controls: 

Keyboard & Mouse: 
Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Use: Spacebar

Gamepad:
Move: Left thumbstick
Look: Right thumbstick
Use: A

Note about performace:

This game is built with UE5 and utilizes Nanite + Lumen. Rendering was optimized for NVidia 3000 series graphics cards. Lower end hardware will likely see performance issues.

Credits: 
Looch Labs
